TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlException extends System.Data.Common.DbException
Public NotInheritable Class SqlException Inherits DbException
public ref class SqlException sealed : System::Data::Common::DbException

summary.span: 當 SQL Server 傳回警告或錯誤時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when SQL Server returns a warning or error.
This class cannot be inherited.
ADO.NET Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Class As Byte
public: property System::Byte Class { System::Byte get(); };

summary.span: 取得從 .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 傳回的錯誤之嚴重性層級。

span.span: Gets the severity level of the error returned from the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.

value.span: 從 1 到 25 的值，表示錯誤的嚴重性層級。

span.span: A value from 1 to 25 that indicates the severity level of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息的嚴重性層級 10 或更少則僅供參考之用，並指出使用者已輸入的資訊中的錯誤所造成的問題。Messages that have a severity level of 10 or less are informational and indicate problems caused by mistakes in information that a user has entered. 嚴重性層級 11 至 16 由使用者產生，並且可以由使用者更正。Severity levels from 11 through 16 are generated by the user, and can be corrected by the user. 17 到 25 的嚴重性層級表示軟體或硬體錯誤。Severity levels from 17 through 25 indicate software or hardware errors. 當層級 17 時、 18 或 19 的錯誤，就會發生，您可以繼續工作，但您可能無法執行特定陳述式。When a level 17, 18, or 19 error occurs, you can continue working, although you might not be able to execute a particular statement. 當嚴重性層級為 19 或低於 19 時， 仍保持開啟。The remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 伺服器時的嚴重性層級 20 或更高，通常會關閉。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server ordinarily closes the . 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 在這兩個情況中， 皆由執行該命令的方法所產生。In both cases, a is generated by the method executing the command. 如需 SQL Server 所傳送的警告和參考用訊息，請參閱 < 疑難排解 > 一節中的 SQL Server 文件。For information about the warning and informational messages sent by SQL Server, see the Troubleshooting section of the SQL Server documentation. 這是包裝函式屬性的第一個在屬性。This is a wrapper for the property of the first in the property. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每個內集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlException.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlException.State Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlException.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlException.State Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Returns the client connection ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需程式碼範例，請參閱。For a code sample, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Errors As SqlErrorCollection

summary.span: 取得一個或多個 物件的集合，這些物件可提供有關 .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 產生的例外狀況之詳細資訊。

span.span: Gets a collection of one or more objects that give detailed information about exceptions generated by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server.

value.span: 類別的已收集執行個體。

span.span: The collected instances of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別一律會包含至少一個執行個體類別。The class always contains at least one instance of the class. 這是包裝函式。This is a wrapper for . 如需有關 SQL Server engine 錯誤的詳細資訊，請參閱[Database Engine 事件和錯誤](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors)。For more information on SQL Server engine errors, see [Database Engine Events and Errors](/sql/relational-databases/errors-events/database-engine-events-and-errors). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每個內集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo si, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo si, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub GetObjectData (si As SerializationInfo, context As StreamingContext)

param.name: si
param.span: ，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

span.span: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.

param.name: context
param.span: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 。

span.span: The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

summary.span: 使用例外狀況的相關資訊來設定 。

span.span: Sets the with information about the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetObjectData` 會使用所有指定要序列化的例外狀況物件資料來設定 `SerializationInfo`。`GetObjectData` sets a `SerializationInfo` with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 在還原序列化期間，從在資料流上傳輸的 `SerializationInfo` 重新組成例外狀況。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the `SerializationInfo` transmitted over the stream.

exception.span: 參數是 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The parameter is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

summary.span: 取得 Transact-SQL 命令批次內的行號或產生錯誤的預存程序 (Stored Procedure)。

span.span: Gets the line number within the Transact-SQL command batch or stored procedure that generated the error.

value.span: Transact-SQL 命令批次內的行號或產生錯誤的預存程序。

span.span: The line number within the Transact-SQL command batch or stored procedure that generated the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將行編號 1; 的啟動如果傳回 0，則，不適用的行號。The line numbering starts at 1; if 0 is returned, the line number is not applicable. 這是包裝函式屬性的第一個在屬性。This is a wrapper for the property of the first in the property. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每個內集合。The following example displays each within the collection.
